definition: an illegal pitch in which a foreign substance (spit or Vaseline) is applied to the ball by the pitcher before he throws it
details:
noun
- an illegal pitch in which a foreign substance (spit or Vaseline) is applied to the ball by the pitcher before he throws it
= synonyms: spitball
- a person who spits (ejects saliva or phlegm from the mouth)
= synonyms: expectorator
